TopicTitle: Need help with a config file.

Articles.Content: In this case im trying to remove all the part requirements in MIsison Controller. But this doesn't really fall into that mods territory. This requires me to delete several lines of code within each mission packs config. WAY to much especially for Bootsraps. So I need a way to quickly edit this .cfg and take out the proper lines I need all at once. Not only that. The part that makes it hard is some configs aren't written very neatly and are just walls of text. Any advise?
